Function Documentation

sx_status_t sx_api_mstp_log_verbosity_level_set ( sx_api_handle_t  handle,
sx_access_cmd_t  cmd,
sx_log_verbosity_target_t  verbosity_target,
sx_verbosity_level_t *  module_verbosity_level_p,
sx_verbosity_level_t *  api_verbosity_level_p 
)

This function sets the log verbosity level of MSTP MODULE

Parameters:
[in] handle - SX-API handle
[in] cmd - SET / GET
[in] verbosity_target - set get verbosity of : API / MODULE / BOTH
[in,out] module_verbosity_level_p - MSTP module verbosity level
[in,out] api_verbosity_level_p - MSTP API verbosity level
Returns:
sx_status_t:

SX_STATUS_SUCCESS - Operation completes successfully

SX_STATUS_CMD_UNSUPPORTED - Unsupported access command

SX_STATUS_INVALID_HANDLE - NULL handle received

SX_STATUS_COMM_ERROR - Client communication channel open failed

SX_STATUS_PARAM_ERROR - Unsupported verbosity_target

sx_status_t sx_api_mstp_mode_set ( const sx_api_handle_t  handle,
const sx_swid_id_t  swid_id,
const sx_mstp_mode_t  mode 
)

This API Sets the Switch STP Activation mode (RSTP/MSTP) in the SDK. As a result, the mapping between Instance(s) to VLAN(s) is deleted.

Parameters:
[in] handle - SX-API handle
[in] swid_id - Switch ID.
[in] mode - STP Activation mode. Can take any of the following: SX_MSTP_MODE_MSTP, (default) SX_MSTP_MODE_RSTP
Returns:
sx_status_t:

SX_STATUS_SUCCESS - Operation completes successfully

SX_STATUS_PARAM_EXCEEDS_RANGE - Parameters out of range

SX_STATUS_MESSAGE_SIZE_ZERO - Message size is Zero

SX_STATUS_MESSAGE_SIZE_EXCEEDS_LIMIT - Message size out of range

SX_STATUS_INVALID_HANDLE - Invalid handle

SX_STATUS_COMM_ERROR - Message send fail

sx_status_t sx_api_mstp_mode_get ( const sx_api_handle_t  handle,
const sx_swid_id_t  swid_id,
sx_mstp_mode_t *  mode_p 
)

This API Retrieves the Switch STP Activation state (RSTP/MSTP) from the SDK.

Parameters:
[in] handle - SX-API handle
[in] swid_id - Switch ID.
[out] mode_p - MSTP Activation state.
Returns:
sx_status_t:

SX_STATUS_SUCCESS - Operation completes successfully

SX_STATUS_PARAM_EXCEEDS_RANGE - Parameters out of range

SX_STATUS_MESSAGE_SIZE_ZERO - Message size is Zero

SX_STATUS_MESSAGE_SIZE_EXCEEDS_LIMIT - Message size out of range

SX_STATUS_INVALID_HANDLE - Invalid handle

SX_STATUS_COMM_ERROR - Message send fail

SX_STATUS_PARAM_NULL - state_p pointer in NULL

sx_status_t sx_api_mstp_inst_set ( const sx_api_handle_t  handle,
const sx_access_cmd_t  cmd,
const sx_swid_id_t  swid_id,
const sx_mstp_inst_id_t  inst_id 
)

This API Adds/Deletes an MSTP Instance to/from the Switch in the SDK.

Parameters:
[in] handle - SX-API handle
[in] cmd - ADD/DELETE
[in] swid_id - Switch ID.
[in] inst_id - MSTP Instance ID to add/delete. Ranges <1-64>.
Returns:
sx_status_t:

SX_STATUS_SUCCESS - Operation completes successfully

SX_STATUS_PARAM_EXCEEDS_RANGE - Parameters out of range

SX_STATUS_MESSAGE_SIZE_ZERO - Message size is Zero

SX_STATUS_MESSAGE_SIZE_EXCEEDS_LIMIT - Message size out of range

SX_STATUS_INVALID_HANDLE - Invalid handle

SX_STATUS_COMM_ERROR - Message send fail

sx_status_t sx_api_mstp_inst_vlan_list_set ( const sx_api_handle_t  handle,
const sx_access_cmd_t  cmd,
const sx_swid_id_t  swid_id,
const sx_mstp_inst_id_t  inst_id,
const sx_vlan_id_t *  vlan_list_p,
const length_t  vlan_num 
)

This API Adds/Deletes a mapping between a list of VLANs to the MSTP Instance in the SDK.

Parameters:
[in] handle - SX-API handle
[in] cmd - ADD/DELTE
[in] swid_id - Switch ID.
[in] inst_id - MSTP Instance ID. Ranges <1-64>.
[in] vlan_list - List of VLANs to Map/Unmap.
[in] vlan_num - Number of VLANs to Map/Unmap. Ranges <1-4094>.
Returns:
sx_status_t:

SX_STATUS_SUCCESS - Operation completes successfully

SX_STATUS_PARAM_EXCEEDS_RANGE - Parameters out of range

SX_STATUS_MESSAGE_SIZE_ZERO - Message size is Zero

SX_STATUS_MESSAGE_SIZE_EXCEEDS_LIMIT - Message size out of range

SX_STATUS_INVALID_HANDLE - Invalid handle

SX_STATUS_COMM_ERROR - Message send fail

SX_STATUS_PARAM_NULL - Parameter vlan_list is NULL

SX_STATUS_CMD_UNSUPPORTED - Unsupported command

sx_status_t sx_api_mstp_inst_vlan_list_get ( const sx_api_handle_t  handle,
const sx_swid_id_t  swid_id,
const sx_mstp_inst_id_t  inst_id,
sx_vlan_id_t *  vlan_list_p,
length_t *  vlan_num_p 
)

This API Retrieves a list of VLANs in the MSTP Instance from the SDK. If the output list (array) is NULL, only the number of VLANs is retrieved.

Parameters:
[in] handle - SX-API handle
[in] swid_id - Switch ID.
[in] inst_id - MSTP Instance ID. Ranges <1-64>.
[out] vlan_list - VLANs array.
[in,out] vlan_num_p - In: Size of VLANs array. Ranges <1-4094>. Out: Number of VLANs retrieved successfully.
Returns:
sx_status_t:

SX_STATUS_SUCCESS - Operation completes successfully

SX_STATUS_PARAM_EXCEEDS_RANGE - Parameters out of range

SX_STATUS_MESSAGE_SIZE_ZERO - Message size is Zero

SX_STATUS_MESSAGE_SIZE_EXCEEDS_LIMIT - Message size out of range

SX_STATUS_INVALID_HANDLE - Invalid handle

SX_STATUS_COMM_ERROR - Message send fail

SX_STATUS_PARAM_NULL - Parameter vlan_list is NULL

SX_STATUS_CMD_UNSUPPORTED - Unsupported command

sx_status_t sx_api_mstp_inst_port_state_set ( const sx_api_handle_t  handle,
const sx_swid_id_t  swid_id,
const sx_mstp_inst_id_t  inst_id,
const sx_port_id_t  port_id,
const sx_mstp_inst_port_state_t  port_state 
)

This API Sets the MSTP Port State for a given Instance in the SDK.

Parameters:
[in] handle - SX-API handle
[in] swid_id - Switch ID.
[in] inst_id - MSTP Instance ID. Ranges <1-64>.
[in] port_id - Port ID (whose STP state to set).
[in] port_state - MSTP Port State. Can take any of the following: SX_MSTP_INST_PORT_STATE_DISCARDING, SX_MSTP_INST_PORT_STATE_LEARNING, SX_MSTP_INST_PORT_STATE_FORWARDING,
Returns:
sx_status_t:

SX_STATUS_SUCCESS - Operation completes successfully

SX_STATUS_PARAM_EXCEEDS_RANGE - Parameters out of range

SX_STATUS_MESSAGE_SIZE_ZERO - Message size is Zero

SX_STATUS_MESSAGE_SIZE_EXCEEDS_LIMIT - Message size out of range

SX_STATUS_INVALID_HANDLE - Invalid handle

SX_STATUS_COMM_ERROR - Message send fail

sx_status_t sx_api_mstp_inst_port_state_get ( const sx_api_handle_t  handle,
const sx_swid_id_t  swid_id,
const sx_mstp_inst_id_t  inst_id,
const sx_port_id_t  port_id,
sx_mstp_inst_port_state_t *  port_state_p 
)

This API Retrieves the MSTP Port State for a given Instance from the SDK.

[in] swid_id - Switch ID.
[in] inst_id - MSTP Instance ID. Ranges <1-64>.
[in] port_id - Port ID (whose STP state to retrieve).
[out] port_state_p - MSTP Port State.
Returns:
sx_status_t:

SX_STATUS_SUCCESS - Operation completes successfully

SX_STATUS_PARAM_EXCEEDS_RANGE - Parameters out of range

const sx_swid_id_t  swid_id,
const sx_port_id_t  port_id,
const sx_mstp_inst_port_state_t  port_state 
)

This API Sets the RSTP Port State in the SDK.

Parameters:
[in] handle - SX-API handle
[in] swid_id - Switch ID.
[in] port_id - Port ID.

Returns:
sx_status_t:
